committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to add certain public lands to the Capulin Mountain National Monument, New Mexico.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Redesignates the Capulin Mountain National Monument in New Mexico as the Capulin Volcano National Monument. Modifies the boundary of such Monument to include additional specified lands.

titles.title: A bill to add certain public lands to the Capulin Mountain National Monument, New Mexico.
